pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:1.1.2: “Tonics” renders bhesajja. In this rule the only bhesajjas mentioned are the five standard tonics. I consequently assume that this is the main meaning of bhesajja in this rule.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:1.4.7: According ACMC, p.18, one doṇa is equivalent to 64 handfuls. This is perhaps roughly equivalent to one litre.
